about_the_game:
Enter the Universe

Five individuals find themselves entangled in a global conspiracy. As they settle conflict across the world, they are led to a truth that challenges the very fabric of their existence. Experience a tale that crosses the boundaries between gospel and deception, and work with your allies in order to unravel the mysteries that lie within Caelum.

Lie of Caelum: Spirit is a JRPG that focuses on engaging combat and a rich story. This title offers exploration, mini-games, some puzzles, and other elements that will appeal even to the most dedicated players. Immerse yourself in a mysterious world where the unexpected awaits.

Features:

  • Full controller support via Xinput

  • Enjoy a turn-based input combo battle system that can bring forth critical attacks or guard on demand based on input timing.

  • Utilize each character's unique kit and grow with them as they unlock more of their skills.

  • Measure your own combat prowess with hi-octane combat and challenging bosses that take note of combat roles.

  • Discover equipment and other items that can either change playstyles or reinforce roles.

  • Experience the story along with side quests and minigames that correspond with the premise of the world.

  • Explore secrets and lore waiting for the brave and adventurous to uncover.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain elements not suitable for those who may find them offensive. These include:

- Self-harm
- Bullying
- Drug/Alcohol abuse
- Disturbing images
- Fictional religion
- Fictional politics
- Implied prostitution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz processing speed or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 or higher/similar
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some content may require internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz processing speed or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 or higher/similar
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some content may require internet connection
